main_definition: Notes can refer to written or printed symbols representing sounds, words, or ideas; also used informally to mean brief recordings of important information.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Written marks indicating pitch in music
meanings_and_examples.example: The sheet music contained many notes that the pianist had to learn.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Fleeting thoughts or reminders written down for quick reference
meanings_and_examples.example: She jotted a few notes on her phone about what groceries she needed to buy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A summary of important points from a lecture, meeting, or discussion
meanings_and_examples.example: The students handed in their notes at the end of class so they could review them later.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Minor changes made to written text by hand
meanings_and_examples.example: The editor marked up the manuscript with corrections and suggested revisions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Informal, short recordings of important information or events for later reference
meanings_and_examples.example: After his doctor's appointment, he took notes on how to care for his new medication.
